item.title: Advice for New Neocaridina Keepers
item.description:
Advice for New Neocaridina Keepers

Here’s my advice for someone starting out with neocaridina shrimp. I don’t pretend to be an expert, but my colonies are thriving so I’m doing something right.

item.title: Shrimp Food Recipe
item.description: It seems like everyone has their own recipe for home made food to feed their shrimp. Here’s mine.

item.title: Nanotank Setup
item.description:
Nanotank Setup Advice

You’ve seen some nice videos on YouTube of small tanks with fresh water shrimp, and now you want one for yourself. Here are some tips on setting a shrimp tank up for yourself.
